```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> points = np.array([-2., 0., 3.])
>>> iv(0, points)
array([2.2795853 , 1\.        , 4.88079259]) 
```

```py
>>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
>>> fig, ax = plt.subplots()
>>> x = np.linspace(-5., 5., 1000)
>>> for i in range(4):
...     ax.plot(x, iv(i, x), label=f'$I_{i!r}$')
>>> ax.legend()
>>> plt.show() 
```
